DOJ halts random DEA passenger searches at transportation facilities  —  The Department of Justice has stopped random Drug Enforcement Administration passenger searches “mass transportation facilities,” such as airports, as of Thursday, after the department's inspector general found concerns with how such searches were being conducted.

Trump still hasn't signed agreements to begin transition of power, White House says  —  WASHINGTON — Two weeks after his election victory, President-elect Donald Trump still has not signed legal documents needed to formally begin the transition of power from the Biden administration, the White House said Thursday.
